name: Scavenger Den
desc: A designated hub and facility area for indepedent scavenger, along with any neccessary facility to launch tech mining expedition into uncharted territory, complete with maintanance gantry, supply market, and local bar. Spawn an Indepedent Scavenger Fleet in your colony and also providing passive income for service you provide to them, will potentially spawn pirates scavenger party when stability is low.

name: Frontier Command Center
desc: Apply Frontier Protocol that make colony invisible to enemy raid and invasion at cost of losing access to wider sector economy, only trade with same faction market, provide small passive income, Also Additional hangars, maintenance bays, command/control center, barracks, and logistics operations required to magnify force projection throughout a star system. Once established, increases the size of militarized patrols launched from the colony.
